actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to limit the antibiotic drugs which may be used in subtherapeutic doses in animal feed.

summary.text: Antibiotics Preservation Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to designate antibiotic drugs which may not be used in subtherapeutic doses in animal feed or in ingredients of animal feed unless such use is required to meet a compelling need. Requires any drug or device used in violation of such requirement to be deemed adulterated.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to limit the antibiotic drugs which may be used in subtherapeutic doses in animal feed.
